body: I think there's also something to be said about enjoying, fantasizing being the "victim" here. Being tormented in the perfect way to your fetishes. Yes it's weird that's why it's a fetish and fetishes themselves are a normal thing to have. Don't judge, and stop thinking it's always about irl projection. Both sides of the coin won't look to practice these things just for enjoying it here in the safety of a 2D drawing

... head empty. Enjoy the art and fap. After you're done, go back to life. The story is just for content, a guide for the work. It's up to you how you perceive it, but since it's still just a fictional thing. It's not worth it man, save your irl ethics for irl shit.
